summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6650 for the improvement of Fox Ave. S. from S. Myrtle St. to S. Brighton St.; and certain other avenues and streets; by constructing a sanitary sewer system and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 104227, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
